page.title: 16TONG RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: Tong School's sports facilities are part of the{Tong Recreation Centre which means that after school hours, at weekends and holidays they are available to the public. As well as the usual casual bookings the Centre Staff organise activities for different groups. On Saturday mornings there is a{gym club}for 4 -l6 year olds and in the afternoons a {"Kids' Fun Session".}One evening a week there is children's{Fame Dancing (dance sequences to music),{roller {skating, badminton and majorettes. There are two evenings for{ladies, one for{aerobics and swimming}and the other for{netball and swimming. For the{men}there is a{Keep Fit club and{weight training. Occasional{Senior Citizens Days}are held with{dancing,bingo,indoor bowls {cards, dominoes and darts.
